name: Heroes of Might and Magic 3: Armageddon's Blade
name_original: Heroes of Might and Magic 3: Armageddon's Blade
description:
Heroes of Might and Magic 3: Armageddon's Blade is a strategy game developed by New World Computing. It was originally released in 1999. It was published by The 3DO Company. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Heroes of Might and Magic 3: Armageddon's Blade on PC.
Paul Romero scored the game.
